author: slava77
body:
use TrackCollection instead of a view of tracks in muon track isolation
the view in the end was never really used

this workaround reduces memory consumption of the muon reco code in HI events.
In Run 262548, Event 12584982, LumiSection 267 of the HIExpress, it generated an extra 4.2 GB.
To be followed up with the framework developers if this was a feature or a bug,
title: use TrackCollection instead of a view of tracks in muon track isolation
